name: Godot Game Test
description:
Testing development with Godot.

There isn't much to do, just walk, attack bushes to change their colors and attack a dummy.

The level changes when the player switches the bushes's colors to the same of the map.

On level 2 there is only a dummy for counting hits on it.

Controls:

Walk - W,A,S,D or Arrow keys

Attack - Ctrl or Mouse Left Button

Projectile - Alt or Mouse Right Button
